page.title: 12ELASTIC SKIPPING
page.content: A GAME TO PLAY AT SCHOOL OR HOME. You need a long piece of elastic with the ends tied together and at least 3 people.Two people stand with the elastic stretched as far as possible, round their ankles.The 3rd person puts one leg in the middle and the other on the outside of the elastic.They jump to the other side into the same position.They repeat this 4 times. Now they jump with both legs into the middle,then both legs outside the elastic. Jump again to stand with one foot on each piece of elastic,then both feet off.Repeat these and other variations with the elastic round the shins, knees and thighs,as wide as you can and with just 1 foot in the elastic. If you are alone tie the elastic round a chair, post, tree,dustbin or anything that is handy.
